metadata.title: CVE-2018-15501 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In ng_pkt in transports/smart_pkt.c in libgit2 before 0.26.6 and 0.27.xbefore 0.27.4, a remote attacker can send a crafted smart-protocol "ng"packet that lacks a '\0' byte to trigger an out-of-bounds read that leadsto DoS.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-15501` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgit2-1.1 - 0.27.4+dfsg.1-0.1
libgit2-fixtures - 0.27.4+dfsg.1-0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libgit2 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.27.4+dfsg.1-0.1').
